DOC.brief_summary: This prospective cohort study diet cancer relation several major cancer , especially breast , prostate , colorectal malignancy . The cohort comprise 50-69 year-old male female member American Association Retired Persons ( AARP ) . In 1995-6 mailed baseline questionnaires 3.5 million AARP member . Over 615,000 AARP member respond , 540,000 provide adequate dietary data . Preliminary analysis indicate cohort , men woman , desire wide distribution percent calorie fat , dietary fiber , fruit vegetable , red meat . Approximately 330,000 initial respondent ( satisfactory data ) return second questionnaire contain question exposure assess first instrument . In term field activity , study relatively quiescent past year . At end five-year period observation , mail cohort member brief follow-up questionnaire primarily target endpoint assessment . ( Because cancer registry lag-time , expect mail questionnaire early 2002 . ) Follow-up largely passive , establish state registry . The initial questionnaire mailing AARP member state select basis registry adequate coverage quality . We use active follow-up , record retrieval , small percentage cohort member move cancer registry area . The buccal cell collection pilot study complete ; 50 % pilot study partricipants complete baseline risk factor questionnaire return buccal cell speciments . Preliminary data pilot study end point ascertainment procedure indicate cohort incidence rate major cancer , determine registry data , consistent SEER rate .
DOC.brief_title: A Prospective Study Diet Cancer Members American Association Retired Persons
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective cohort study investigate relation among diet , lifestyle cancer . The cohort comprise 50-69 year-old male female member American Association Retired Persons ( AARP ) . In 1995-96 mailed baseline questionnaires 3.5 million AARP member . Over 615,000 AARP member respond , 540,000 provide adequate dietary data . Preliminary analysis indicate cohort , men woman , desire wide distribution percent calorie fat , dietary fiber , fruit vegetable , red meat . Approximately 330,000 initial respondent ( satisfactory data ) return second questionnaire contain question exposure assess first instrument . In 2004-2006 mailed follow-up questionnaire living participant assess non-cancer endpoint lifestyle factor .
DOC.criteria: INCLUSION CRITERIA : Patients participate select American Association Retired Persons age 5069 live one follow state metropolitan area : California ( minus Los Angeles county ) , Florida , Pennsylvania , New Jersey , Louisiana , North Carolina , Detroit , Atlanta .
